from math import *
from random import *

def solve(n):
	L = list(map(int,input().split()))
	Q = 0
	X = [0] * 1000001
	for i in range(1, 1000001):
	    X[i] = X[i-1]^i

	for i in range(1, n + 1):
	    Q^=L[i-1]
	    x=n%i
	    y=n//i
	    if(y%2==1):
	        Q^=X[i-1]
	    Q^=X[x]
	return Q

print(solve(int(input())))
